item.title: Robot Bounded in Circle
item.description: Problem Link Input/Output Analysis Input - instructions: str a string of instructions, which will be repeated forever. 1 <= instructions.length <= 100 instructions[i] is 'G', 'L' or 'R' For each instruction: 'G': moves the robot 1 step forward by adding the current direction to its position 'L' and 'R': rotate the direction vector 90 degrees Output - True/False True: The robot is bounded in a circle (will return to origin eventually) False: The robot will move infinitely far from the origin To determine if the robot is bounded, we check after one execution of the instructions:
